Google's services contain a number of [[easter egg (virtual)|easter eggs]]; for instance, the Language Tools page offers the search interface in the [[Swedish Chef]]'s "Bork bork bork," [[Pig Latin]], âHackerâ (Actually [[leetspeak]]), [[Elmer Fudd]], and [[Klingon language|Klingon]].<ref>"[http://www.google.com/language_tools?hl=en Language Tools]." ''[[Google]].'' Retrieved on [[January 24]], [[2007]].</ref>

==Elgoog==
  +
If you type in elgoog in the search bar at google.com, it will put everything backwards.
